data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OR4YAxz0KKYQ7kNvgE-PjT0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzZhLE49Y1qDM9iTCu3Ryz3fj2a2pOEGKNkW5Sw2k7lA&oe=66E1930C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_2KMeJ3nxoIQ7kNvgEYGJE-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAneGkDOf-yFjX75qr1d8C4AOvu-cITyHR7I_en15CPkg&oe=66E1911F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hfQuI7HEImoQ7kNvgGYwBjU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDdaI3FILuKZ8r2ro2-w0_QPlmKeBLqUnaO6rJUjogW3Q&oe=66E17671)
